name: Color Pix
description:
Spent a week learning gamedev with Godot and decided to enter OMGJam4 and make my first game. I didn't have much time to make a lot of levels, so the last level is seeing how difficult the game could potentially be. It is beatable, just pretty hard :)

Controls

Press space to toggle gravity.

Collect colored pills to only be affected by that color spike.
